function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI in drug discovery for contagious diseases without thorough validation and testing","Impact":"Potential for ineffective or harmful drugs to enter the market","Mitigation":"Thorough validation of AI-generated drug candidates through rigorous testing and clinical trials","Technologies":"Clinical trial platforms, drug validation technologies","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Repurposing existing drugs without sufficient evidence for effectiveness against COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of using drugs that may not be effective against COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies and trials to validate the effectiveness of repurposed drugs","Technologies":"Clinical trial platforms, drug validation technologies","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Development of AI-created drugs without comprehensive understanding of potential side effects","Impact":"Possibility of unforeseen side effects in AI-created drugs","Mitigation":"Thorough analysis of potential side effects and long-term impact of AI-created drugs through extensive testing","Technologies":"Drug safety testing platforms, pharmacovigilance technologies","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"}]}
